DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to describe differences in meal-stimulated gut hormone response, appetite and intestinal transit time between good and poor responders 1-2 years after Gastric Bypass surgery for obesity.
DOC.brief_title: Gut Hormone Response, Appetite and Intestinal Transit Time in Good and Poor Weight Responders After Gastric Bypass
DOC.criteria: Age 2060 years Completed laparoscopic gastric bypass surgery without complications (cases) No previous gastric bypass surgery (controls) Diabetes Disease or treatment interfering with appetite or gastrointestinal motility Pregnancy or breastfeeding Excess weight loss 1 year after gastric bypass > 50% and =< 60% (cases)
